attributes.action: make available top up degrees to those forced to change careers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many long term sick and disabled are highly qualified (above NVQ2) and wish to return to work.  These people often hold degrees and wish to contribute properly to society but many vocations are now accessible only by completion of a degree in the relevant subject (medicine, pharmacy, herbal medicine, acupuncture, physiotherapy, osteopathy, naturopathy, etc). Preferably these subjects wiould run for (say) 2 not 3 years and be available as part time courses.  Make available such top up degrees and the funding so they can do them.
